name: AMP blogger templates
tagline: This repository contains my amp implemented templates for blogger. Feel free to reuse, share, improve and contribute.
body:
### Welcome
Looking for implementing amp on blogger? You can find responsive blogger templates here.

### Disclaimer
These templates are provided on a AS IS basis. No warranty is provided with this template. **Make sure to backup your blogs template before implementing these templates.**

### Authors and Contributors
 - @kolappannathan

### Support
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) for more info.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
